casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Chris Darryl DRYE. No. 2P09-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. LaToya B. Powell, Assistant Attorney General, Roxann Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of January 2009 by Defendant for Issuance of Certificate of Probable Cause for Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2009."
